schema:creator: Kinne, Hadley
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ I used colored pencils and a regular pencil and drew four activities I've been doing since shelter in place. 1-2. Lots of outside time like climbing trees and rollerblading 3. Baking like it's going out of style - I've made lemon curd danish braid brioche buns strawberry shortcake  
 __Participant age:__ 9  
 __Category:__  Kids Age 9-11 (drawings/paintings only)
schema:name: Different But Fun Times
